description:
Grab Nebula for 40% off: https://go.nebula.tv/the-closer-look

Here's my exposition video: https://nebula.tv/videos/the-closer-look-how-to-write-great-exposition

Chemistry is so fun to write, yet also bloody hard to get right. In this video essay, I break down how you can create it in your stories.

title: How To Write Character Chemistry
